Articles.Content:
So, this challenge is actually pretty hard in my opinion, BE WARNED!

The challenge:

Circumnavigate Kerbin in a rover boat mix thingy

Craft Requirements:

Rover must have wheels (any kind).

Must be stock. (Exceptions include: Kerbal Engineer, Mechjeb, and Infernal Robotics)

Must float.

Cannot fly, no matter what, sorry.

Only exception to flying is if you need to refuel your rover.

Challenge Requirements:

Stay as close to the equator as possible.

Start from stock KSC, nowhere else.

Map the route you went on.

You must do it after 5/27/15, nothing before this counts. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

You can use a craft that was made before 5/27/15 but it is not recommended because of 1.02

If you complete this holy crap you have way too much time on your hands

You also get to put this in your sig:

(Still working on pic)

Good luck!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-28T20:54:25Z" title="05/28/2015 08:54  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 28, 2015</time> by Kozak**

Can I, perhaps, re-do a previous circumnavigation? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Same route, different vehicle?

Edit: Just saw the stock-only rule. Never mind!

Woo! The mods I use are acceptable!

I'll probably start making my run early next week ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-28T21:00:06Z" title="05/28/2015 09:00  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 28, 2015</time> by Slam\_Jones**

> 
> Can I, perhaps, re-do a previous circumnavigation? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Same route, different vehicle?
> Edit: Just saw the stock-only rule. Never mind!

Check again ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Also, you can do that so long as you stay as close to the equator as possible, preferably on or within a few km of it at all times

If you do that you'll end up back at KSC ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-28T21:07:42Z" title="05/28/2015 09:07  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 28, 2015</time> by Kozak**

You took my thoughts straight out of my head! I was planning to do this today, but i didn't have enough time. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Might try this on the weekend.

Can someone help me make the completion sig pic?

Let me know if you can and i'll send details on how i'd like it to be ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I know i probably sound boring, but i would like to if you insist.

Ummm, I'm sorry, but ummm, is there some difference between this and[my challenge](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113778-The-Elcano-Challenge-Ground-based-circumnavigation)? Why do we need two?
I've never heard of your challenge lol, I thought i was being original with the requirements ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> I've never heard of your challenge lol, I thought i was being original with the requirements ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Well, you were, just about 2 months late. Now Shoo. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Wafle Master, let me know if you'd like to have this one closed, it does seem to be a duplicate of Fengist's challenge.
